description: Episode number 5 of Series "The Photographic vision". Comments from well-known photographers and illustrations of their work center around the topic of the art and craft of manipulating light in the camera. Examines the effect of shutter, aperture, and camera pans. Photographers John Divola and Linda Connor discuss their work and how they use the technical aspects of photography to achieve creative effects.
